1. Choose the correct sentence:
options: A) He don't know the answer.
B) He doesn't knows the answer.
C) He doesn't know the answer.
D) He don't knows the answer.
questions.answer: C) He doesn't know the answer.

questions.question: 2. Which of the following is the synonym of "Abundant"?
3. Choose the correct indirect speech for the sentence: "She said, 'I am reading a book.'"
options: A) She said that she is reading a book.
B) She said that she has been reading a book.
C) She said that she was reading a book.
D) She said that she will read a book.
questions.answer: C) She said that she was reading a book.

questions.question: 4. Identify the error in the following sentence: "Neither of the two candidates have completed their projects."
